snippet: Nemanja Bjelica made a difficult layup with less than a second remaining to lift Serbia to a 68-66 victory over Germany.
abstract: Serbia defeats Germany, 68-66, in European basketball championship; other tournament scores given.
lead_paragraph: Nemanja Bjelica made a difficult layup with less than a second remaining to lift Serbia to a 68-66 victory over Germany.

headline.main: Serbia Edges Germany at the European Basketball Championship
